TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Stopwatch extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组方法和属性，可用于准确地测量运行时间。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that you can use to accurately measure elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个实例可以经过的时间测量一个时间间隔，或已用时间的总和，跨多个时间间隔。A instance can measure elapsed time for one interval, or the total of elapsed time across multiple intervals. 在典型方案中，调用方法，然后最终调用方法，然后检查已用时间使用属性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 一个实例是运行还是已停止; 使用来确定当前状态的。A instance is either running or stopped; use to determine the current state of a . 使用以开始测量运行时间; 使用停止测量运行时间。Use to begin measuring elapsed time; use to stop measuring elapsed time. 查询占用时间值通过属性， ，或。Query the elapsed time value through the properties , , or . 正在运行或已停止实例时，您可以查询运行时间属性。You can query the elapsed time properties while the instance is running or stopped. 已用时间属性则稳步增多而是运行; 它们保持不变时停止的实例。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下，占用时间值的实例等于所有测量的时间间隔的总。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用开始计数累积的运行时间; 每次调用结束当前的时间间隔测量，并在冻结累积的运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法以清除中现有的累计已用时间实例。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. 测量运行时间计数基础计时器机制中的计时器时钟周期。The measures elapsed time by counting timer ticks in the underlying timer mechanism. 如果安装的硬件和操作系统支持高分辨率性能计数器，则类使用该计数器来测量运行时间。If the installed hardware and operating system support a high-resolution performance counter, then the class uses that counter to measure elapsed time. 否则为类使用系统计时器来测量运行时间。Otherwise, the class uses the system timer to measure elapsed time. 使用并字段来确定的精度和分辨率计时实现。Use the and fields to determine the precision and resolution of the timing implementation. 类的托管代码中的与计时相关的性能计数器的操作提供帮助。The class assists the manipulation of timing-related performance counters within managed code. 具体而言，字段和方法来代替非托管的 Windows Api`QueryPerformanceFrequency`和`QueryPerformanceCounter`。Specifically, the field and method can be used in place of the unmanaged Windows APIs `QueryPerformanceFrequency` and `QueryPerformanceCounter`. > [!NOTE] > 在多处理器计算机上并不重要哪个处理器运行的线程。On a multiprocessor computer, it does not matter which processor the thread runs on. 但是，由于在 BIOS 或硬件抽象层 (HAL) 中的 bug，可以在不同的处理器上获取不同的计时结果。However, because of bugs in the BIOS or the Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL), you can get different timing results on different processors. 若要指定线程的处理器关联，请使用方法。To specify processor affinity for a thread, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类，以确定应用程序的执行时间。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to determine the execution time for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何将类来计算性能数据。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to calculate performance data. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回实例停止，并且该实例将运行时间属性为零。The returned instance is stopped, and the elapsed time property of the instance is zero. 使用方法开始测量运行时间与新实例。Use the method to begin measuring elapsed time with the new instance. 使用方法来初始化新实例，并立即启动它。Use the method to initialize a new instance and immediately start it. ## Examples 下面的示例初始化通过使用简单的类构造函数的实例。The following example initializes a instance by using a simple class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Elapsed As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan Elapsed { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前实例测量得出的总运行时间。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.

value.span: 一个只读的 ，用于表示当前实例测量得出的总运行时间。

span.span: A read-only representing the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型方案中，调用方法，然后最终调用方法，然后检查已用时间使用属性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 使用属性来检索所经过的时间值使用方法和属性。Use the property to retrieve the elapsed time value using methods and properties. 例如，您可以设置的格式返回实例为文本表示形式，或将其传递给需要另一个类参数。For example, you can format the returned instance into a text representation, or pass it to another class that requires a parameter. 查询属性， ，并虽然实例正在运行或已停止。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 已用时间属性则稳步增多而是运行; 它们保持不变时停止的实例。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下，占用时间值的实例等于所有测量的时间间隔的总。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用开始计数累积的运行时间; 每次调用结束当前的时间间隔测量，并在冻结累积的运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法以清除中现有的累计已用时间实例。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定应用程序的执行时间。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the execution time for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElapsedMilliseconds As Long
public: property long ElapsedMilliseconds { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前实例测量得出的总运行时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in milliseconds.

value.span: 一个只读长整型，表示当前实例测量得出的总毫秒数。

span.span: A read-only long integer representing the total number of milliseconds measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示已用时间向下舍入为最接近的整数毫秒值。This property represents elapsed time rounded down to the nearest whole millisecond value. 对于较高的精度措施，使用或属性。For higher precision measurements, use the or properties. 查询属性， ，并虽然实例正在运行或已停止。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 已用时间属性则稳步增多而是运行; 它们保持不变时停止的实例。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下，占用时间值的实例等于所有测量的时间间隔的总。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用开始计数累积的运行时间; 每次调用结束当前的时间间隔测量，并在冻结累积的运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法以清除中现有的累计已用时间实例。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类来测量性能的四个不同实现，用于分析字符串之间的一个整数。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElapsedTicks As Long
public: property long ElapsedTicks { long get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取当前实例测量得出的总运行时间（用计时器计时周期表示）。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in timer ticks.

value.span: 一个只读长整型，表示当前实例测量得出的计时器计时周期的总数。

span.span: A read-only long integer representing the total number of timer ticks measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示基础计时器机制中的已用计时周期数。This property represents the number of elapsed ticks in the underlying timer mechanism. 刻度线是最小时间单位的计时器可以测量。A tick is the smallest unit of time that the timer can measure. 使用字段将转换值的秒数。Use the field to convert the value into a number of seconds. 查询属性， ，并虽然实例正在运行或已停止。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 已用时间属性则稳步增多而是运行; 它们保持不变时停止的实例。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下，占用时间值的实例等于所有测量的时间间隔的总。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用开始计数累积的运行时间; 每次调用结束当前的时间间隔测量，并在冻结累积的运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法以清除中现有的累计已用时间实例。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. > [!NOTE] > 计时周期数是不同于。 ticks are different from . 在每个时钟周期值表示一个 100 纳秒时间间隔。Each tick in the value represents one 100-nanosecond interval. 中的每个计时周期值表示的时间间隔等于 1 秒除以。Each tick in the value represents the time interval equal to 1 second divided by the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用类来测量性能的四个不同实现，用于分析字符串之间的一个整数。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Frequency As Long

summary.span: 获取以每秒计时周期数表示的计时器频率。

span.span: Gets the frequency of the timer as the number of ticks per second.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计时器频率表示的计时器精度和解决方法。The timer frequency indicates the timer precision and resolution. 例如，2 百万的计时器频率的计时每第二个等于每个时钟周期的 500 纳秒的计时器分辨率。For example, a timer frequency of 2 million ticks per second equals a timer resolution of 500 nanoseconds per tick. 换而言之，由于一秒等于 10 亿个纳秒为单位，每秒 200 万个计时周期的计时器频率相当于每 10 亿的毫微秒，可以进一步简化为每 500 毫微秒 1 个时钟周期的 200 万个刻度。In other words, because one second equals 1 billion nanoseconds, a timer frequency of 2 million ticks per second is equivalent to 2 million ticks per 1 billion nanoseconds, which can be further simplified to 1 tick per 500 nanoseconds. 值取决于基础计时机制的解析。The value depends on the resolution of the underlying timing mechanism. 如果安装的硬件和操作系统支持高分辨率性能计数器，则值反映了该计数器的频率。If the installed hardware and operating system support a high-resolution performance counter, then the value reflects the frequency of that counter. 否则为值基于系统计时器频率。Otherwise, the value is based on the system timer frequency. 因为频率取决于安装的硬件和操作系统，系统运行时，值保持不变。Because the frequency depends on the installed hardware and operating system, the value remains constant while the system is running. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的频率和分辨率计时器。The following example displays the frequency and resolution of a timer. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int64 GetTimestamp() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetTimestamp () As Long

summary.span: 获取计时器机制中的当前最小时间单位数。

span.span: Gets the current number of ticks in the timer mechanism.

returns.span: 一个长整型，表示基础计时器机制中的计时周期计数器值。

span.span: A long integer representing the tick counter value of the underlying timer mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类使用高分辨率性能计数器，返回该计数器的当前值。If the class uses a high-resolution performance counter, returns the current value of that counter. 如果类使用系统计时器返回当前属性的实例。If the class uses the system timer, returns the current property of the instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来更新性能计数器。The following example illustrates the use of the method to update a performance counter. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CPP/elapsedtime.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CS/elapsedtime.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/VB/elapsedtime.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IsHighResolution As Boolean

summary.span: 指示计时器是否基于高分辨率性能计数器。

span.span: Indicates whether the timer is based on a high-resolution performance counter.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用计时器类取决于系统硬件和操作系统。The timer used by the class depends on the system hardware and operating system. 是`true`如果计时器是否基于高分辨率性能计数器。 is `true` if the timer is based on a high-resolution performance counter. 否则为是`false`，这指示计时器是否基于系统计时器。Otherwise, is `false`, which indicates that the timer is based on the system timer. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的频率和分辨率计时器。The following example displays the frequency and resolution of a timer. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个指示 计时器是否在运行的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the timer is running.

value.span: 如果 实例当前正在运行，并且在对某个时间间隔的运行时间进行测量，则该值为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance is currently running and measuring elapsed time for an interval; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个实例开始运行通过调用或。A instance begins running with a call to or . 通过调用运行该实例会停止或。The instance stops running with a call to or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 停止时间间隔测量，并将运行时间重置为零。

span.span: Stops time interval measurement and resets the elapsed time to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个实例计算，并跨多个时间间隔，保留的累积的运行时间，直到重置实例。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset. 使用停止当前的时间间隔测量，并保留累积的运行时间值。Use to stop the current interval measurement and retain the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用停止任何正在进行中的时间间隔测量和清除占用时间值。Use to stop any interval measurement in progress and clear the elapsed time value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Restart() cil managed

summary.span: 停止时间间隔测量，将运行时间重置为零，然后开始测量运行时间。

span.span: Stops time interval measurement, resets the elapsed time to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个实例计算，并跨多个时间间隔，保留的累积的运行时间，直到重置或重新启动实例。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset or restarted. 使用停止当前的时间间隔测量，并保留累积的运行时间值。Use to stop the current interval measurement and retain the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用停止任何正在进行中的时间间隔测量和清除占用时间值。Use to stop any interval measurement in progress and clear the elapsed time value. 使用停止当前的时间间隔测量，并启动新的时间间隔测量。Use to stop current interval measurement and start a new interval measurement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

summary.span: 开始或继续测量某个时间间隔的运行时间。

span.span: Starts, or resumes, measuring elapsed time for an interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型方案中，调用方法，然后最终调用方法，然后检查已用时间使用属性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 启动后，计时器来测量当前间隔已用的计时器刻度为单位，直到在实例处于已停止或重置。Once started, a timer measures the current interval, in elapsed timer ticks, until the instance is stopped or reset. 启动，它是已在运行不将计时器状态更改或重置的运行时间属性。Starting a that is already running does not change the timer state or reset the elapsed time properties. 当实例测量多个时间间隔，方法继续测量从当前的运行时间值的时间。When a instance measures more than one interval, the method resumes measuring time from the current elapsed time value. 一个实例计算，并跨多个时间间隔，保留的累积的运行时间，直到重置实例。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset. 使用方法之前调用清除中累积的运行时间实例。Use the method before calling to clear the cumulative elapsed time in a instance. 使用方法并使用单个命令。Use the method to and the with a single command. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以启动一个计时器，用于测量应用程序的执行时间。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to start a timer that measures the execution time of an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch StartNew() cil managed
Public Shared Function StartNew () As Stopwatch

summary.span: 对新的 实例进行初始化，将运行时间属性设置为零，然后开始测量运行时间。

span.span: Initializes a new instance, sets the elapsed time property to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.

returns.span: 刚刚开始测量运行时间的 。

span.span: A that has just begun measuring elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法相当于调用构造函数，然后再调用上的新实例。This method is equivalent to calling the constructor and then calling on the new instance. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类来测量性能的四个不同实现，用于分析字符串之间的一个整数。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止测量某个时间间隔的运行时间。

span.span: Stops measuring elapsed time for an interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型方案中，调用方法，然后最终调用方法，然后检查已用时间使用属性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 方法结束当前的时间间隔测量。The method ends the current time interval measurement. 正在停止，它是未运行不会将计时器状态更改或重置运行时间属性。Stopping a that is not running does not change the timer state or reset the elapsed time properties. 当实例测量多个时间间隔，方法相当于暂停的时间度量。When a instance measures more than one interval, the method is equivalent to pausing the elapsed time measurement. 后续调用继续测量从当前的运行时间值的时间。A subsequent call to resumes measuring time from the current elapsed time value. 使用方法以清除中累积的运行时间实例。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in a instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来停止一个计时器，用于测量应用程序的执行时间。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to stop a timer that measures the execution time of an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]
